entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the evening and ending overnight then clearing. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
